caller_intent: David wants to process a homeowners insurance proposal received via email, correct details on the policy (including his wife's name and auto policy information), and pay the premium for coverage starting July 26th.
resolution_steps: Confirmed David's State Farm policy expiration date (July 15th) and verified no mortgage or claims in the last 5 years.
Corrected his wife's name (Sam E. Sipaw) and auto policy details in the proposal.
Adjusted deductible from $2,500 to $1,000, resulting in a $1,607 annual premium.
Processed full payment via credit card (ending in 4147) for the policy.
Emailing the application for electronic signing and sending a receipt from Northwest Farmers.
systems_referenced: Email system for application and receipt
summary: David finalized a homeowners insurance policy with Northwest Farmers after correcting personal details and adjusting the deductible. Heather processed the $1,607 annual premium payment and sent the application for electronic signing. The policy will take effect July 26th, replacing his expired State Farm coverage.
